title: THE BEAT OF OUR HEARTS..
text:
Can your heart beat with mine? 
I see a lot of interesting ads here on Craigslist. People looking for the next big things whether that be an affair, a hook up, a relationship, or those who are looking for an ego boost and steal pictures.

About four years ago, I lost my partner of 12 years. Yes, we were really young when we got together; and yes, I just recently turned 32. He died honorably while serving this country. 

In the 12 years we were together I learned many things. I learned that a relationship is a risk. You don't need to get on 60 dates to know if someone is right for you. Why? Because you are going to spend the rest of your life getting to know someone. You know, it was after 4 years that I actually knew my husband's favorite color. People think they can have life figured out before they settle down, but that will never happen.

People these days are so picky that I guarantee they have missed out on many opportunities at love; yet, they will sit on social media and complain because they are alone. People are humans, and a human life is a beautiful thing no matter their age, color, weight, or their body. 
Love is seeing past flaws. We all have flaws and imperfections. From what I see on Craigslist, not too many people can see past flaws with all these laundry lists of credentials for someone to be able to contact them. 

Love sees no wrong. There were so many times my hubby did something foolish, but I always defended him to the ground. There were times when I was wrong, and I admitted it. There were times when I was right, but would just laugh and agree to disagree. 
We kept our personal life personal. When things went wrong we dealt with them as a team. We didn't post things on Facebook for people to butt in and give their opinion about something. 
There were times I wanted to run over than man with a damn bus, he was so ornery. But I would look into his eyes as they gleamed at me. You could see the depth of his love in his eyes. 

When we were engaged, we did just that. The rings may have been cheap, but we did it the right way. Changing your profile to engaged or married is not the same thing. 
I always tell people, "Just because it Shines -- It Doesn't Mean It's Gold!" Even the most physically attractive guys can be the worst candidates for someone to settle down with. 

Every night when we went to bed, I would lay may head on his chest and listen to him breathe. It was funny because we almost took the same identical breathes. 
Can love happen immediately? YES it can. Love happens when it happens. There are no rules to dating and falling for someone. 

I am not looking for someone to replace this great man. But I know, there is another great man who can walk this journey of life with me and breathe the breath of life together. Can your heart beat with mine? Who knows, and it doesn't have to. But wouldn't it be amazing to take that risk and find out?

ABOUT ME: I am Latin and Egyptian, with an average body. For those who it is important to, I am a bottom. I enjoy volunteering, travel, cook outs, dining out, time with friends, road trips, theme parks, hiking, museums, etc. I can be ornery and sassy at times. I am definitely not shy. 
If you would like to reply, you can text me or email me. Please provide a picture of yourself , and I will respond with one as well. Cameras hate me and my pictures do me no justice. Isn't awful that we are judged by these awful pictures? 

If you want to text, you can email me your number and we can go from there!
So, can your heart beat with mine? Who wants to find out?
Thank you for reading!

If you'd like, you can reach me at 206 Nine Zero Zero and then 5861! Yes that's a real number.

text:
I am a 50's WM who prefers the company of a younger man - just one. I'm not looking to share someone, treat them as a slave, put them in diapers, etc. Eventually I would like someone who will live with me as my wife/son/partner. By 'younger', I mean about 5-15 years younger or so. Younger than that 'may' work, but I'm afraid we wouldn't have a lot in common.

Wife - in that you want to take care of the house, the shopping, cooking, cleaning, laundry, etc. Think a June Cleaver minus the pearls.(Google it if you're under 40). :-)

Son - in that you are a somewhat shy, submissive type of person who likes others to make the major decisions and looks to them for guidance and mentoring.

Partner - in that you enjoy traveling together, spending time in each other's company and consider me first in your life, as I would consider you.

Sexually, I want someone who derives genuine pleasure in taking care of their man. Not a slave who wishes to be punished or someone who wants to be degraded, etc. But someone who gets a thrill out of knowing they are desired, that their body is bringing pleasure to someone they care for. I would prefer that you be hip or slim. A bit more is okay, but you should want to work with me in getting into shape if so. I would prefer you to be smooth, whether naturally or willing to become so. I generally prefer someone my height to very short - waifish even.

We can explore sexual and social fantasies and desires - yes, some fantasies extend beyond the bedroom - how we wish to be treated, the image we project, how people see us - all can lead to a greater emotional fulfillment and sexual satisfaction when we return home - or wherever we choose to become intimate.

We will not exchange nude photos online, that revelation is reserved for face-to-face meetings. I am a casual naturist and enjoy going to nude beaches and being naked at home and other outdoor locations. I have friends who may visit and also divest themselves of their clothing - though this is not a sexual thing.

If any of this sounds interesting, and you like the idea of working toward the goal of living together under my roof and my rules, drop me a line. Actually, drop me several. I value the ability to express yourself. If you can't articulate your interests, desires and expectations to me, then I have little chance of making you truly content in our life together.

I hope there is one special soul out there who reads this and finds that it resonates with them. If that is you - go ahead, hit 'reply' and let's see where it leads.

. . . 

And if you're reading this and are thinking that you don't have a chance because you don't have a penis - think again. The size, or even existence, of your penis doesn't make you a man - and this man is utterly unconcerned about the size, or existence, of yours.

And if you've read this far - I should say that since I've posted this I've received a dozen or so replies - some became angry with me and felt that my words held hidden or ulterior intent. Some simply stopped writing after two or three emails. And a couple chatted for quite a while before either going silent or standing me up for our first meeting. PLEASE - if you are NOT going to meet, save us both the trouble and don't answer. If you find yourself wondering just what is intended behind my words, are trying to psychoanalyze me or find a hidden agenda - don't bother answering. I'm about as open a person as you're likely to find - I am always honest about my feelings and desires - I only ask that you be willing to accept what I say rather than looking for something behind the words. We've all been hurt before - but sometimes it takes a leap of faith to find that special love.

title: Married Man 4 Married Man
text:
A closed-loop relationship (CLR) consists of two married men who don't cheat on their wives with other women and who don't fool around with other guys. It's an actual friendship between the guys, not just a physical liaison. And, the bond between the guys is separate from the married relationship they have with their wives. The goal is to provide marital stability and to bond with another guy.

There are many reasons why a married man would not consider coming out, most often these include strong family bonds and children. In the end, each man has his reasons for seeking this type of specific arrangement. This is another facet of the multitude of M2M paths present in society today.

You can be bi, straight, gay, bi-curious, or just curious, or anything in between. As long as you're a man married to a woman, plan on staying married, have a need to bond with another guy, and IF physical relations are to be involved, are willing to commit to only that guy, or are a single man willing to commit to monogamy and respect for the married partner's marriage.

There is a Yahoo Group for men who are in or seek a CLR. This site is for all guys who agree with the principles of this concept. This is a tasteful, safe environment for guys to discuss with and meet other like-minded guys. Here is the link to join:

groups(dot)yahoo(dot)com/neo/groups/Closed-Loop/info

Note: In order to access the above site, you will need to log into your Yahoo account/ID and then go to above link (replace the word 'dot' with a period when entering this address in your browser). There you will have the option to join the group and gain full access to group, and the information there. You cannot access this group unless you sign up for a Yahoo account or have a Yahoo account already.

title: THE PERFECT WEEKEND!
text:
What kind of people are out there? How many will actually read this? How many actually value human lives and their relationships? 

Can your heart beat with mine? 

I see a lot of interesting ads here on Craigslist. People looking for the next big things whether that be an affair, a hook up, a relationship, or those who are looking for an ego boost and steal pictures.

About four years ago, I lost my partner of 12 years. Yes, we were really young when we got together; and yes, I just recently turned 32. He died honorably while serving this country. 

In the 12 years we were together I learned many things. I learned that a relationship is a risk. You don't need to get on 60 dates to know if someone is right for you. Why? Because you are going to spend the rest of your life getting to know someone. You know, it was after 4 years that I actually knew my husband's favorite color. People think they can have life figured out before they settle down, but that will never happen.

People these days are so picky that I guarantee they have missed out on many opportunities at love; yet, they will sit on social media and complain because they are alone. People are humans, and a human life is a beautiful thing no matter their age, color, weight, or their body. 
Love is seeing past flaws. We all have flaws and imperfections. From what I see on Craigslist, not too many people can see past flaws with all these laundry lists of credentials for someone to be able to contact them. 

Love sees no wrong. There were so many times my hubby did something foolish, but I always defended him to the ground. There were times when I was wrong, and I admitted it. There were times when I was right, but would just laugh and agree to disagree. 
We kept our personal life personal. When things went wrong we dealt with them as a team. We didn't post things on Facebook for people to butt in and give their opinion about something. 
There were times I wanted to run over than man with a damn bus, he was so ornery. But I would look into his eyes as they gleamed at me. You could see the depth of his love in his eyes. 

When we were engaged, we did just that. The rings may have been cheap, but we did it the right way. Changing your profile to engaged or married is not the same thing. 
I always tell people, "Just because it Shines -- It Doesn't Mean It's Gold!" Even the most physically attractive guys can be the worst candidates for someone to settle down with. 

Every night when we went to bed, I would lay may head on his chest and listen to him breathe. It was funny because we almost took the same identical breathes. 
Can love happen immediately? YES it can. Love happens when it happens. There are no rules to dating and falling for someone. 

I am not looking for someone to replace this great man. But I know, there is another great man who can walk this journey of life with me and breathe the breath of life together. Can your heart beat with mine? Who knows, and it doesn't have to. But wouldn't it be amazing to take that risk and find out?

ABOUT ME: I am Latin and Egyptian, with an average body. For those who it is important to, I am a bottom. I enjoy volunteering, travel, cook outs, dining out, time with friends, road trips, theme parks, hiking, museums, etc. I can be ornery and sassy at times. I am definitely not shy. 
If you would like to reply, you can text me or email me. Please provide a picture of yourself , and I will respond with one as well. Cameras hate me and my pictures do me no justice. Isn't awful that we are judged by these awful pictures? 

If you want to text, you can email me your number and we can go from there!
So, can your heart beat with mine? Who wants to find out?
Thank you for reading! 

You can reach me at 206 Nine Zero Zero 5861! Hope to hear from you!!
